appendix.title: Tinkar Model Concepts (In Progress)
appendix.para: The Tinkar core architecture is designed to be extremely flexible. This flexibility supports the ability to assert relationships among diverse terminologies and to support change in the design of those terminologies. However, it means that there may be more than one way to support any specific requirement.
We propose the following members of the Tinkar Model Concepts.
Below is an example of a subset of Tinkar Model Concepts. The full list and definitions of the core Tinkar Model Concepts is in progress and will be completed by the ballot submission deadline.
